title: 簡單快速拿彩票-湯姆熊 [Quick Arcade Tickets with Ball Drop] GameLog 1 (Eng Sub)

json.text: Today I am going to show my way to get easy and quick arcade tickets
I am aiming at the 100 tickets
the JACKPOT now has only 60 tickets
pretty lucky, 40 tickets here
this video is
showing everyone how to get fast and easy tickets
this arcade game is called Slam-A-Winner or Ball Drop
you can find this arcade game almost in every arcade store
back to the main topic, the technique is
we want to have a hole-in-one, which means we want the ball drops directly into the desired hole
my technique is to find a marking
the marking that i picked is the plastic mounting on the left of the hole
when the desired hole just passes the marking
I will immediately press the ball drop button
by using this skill, the chance of winning is very high
this is the first video about arcade, I like all types of video-game, so I decided to try this kind of vlog
I will post new videos
to continue to share my video-gaming experiences
hope everyone can win quick and easy tickets
if there is any question or you want to share different techniques
feel free to leave a comment below
remember to subscribe, and hit the "like" button
bye bye
